pages.text: Staples of Wool can be obtained by shearing an O-Sheep. Some sheep may have different colors of wool, such as White, Black, Brown, and Greys. $(br2)In order to get Wool Blocks, you must process the Staples of Wool with a Spindle. You can get 2 Wool Blocks per Staple. $(br2)You can also craft Wool Dye as a more efficient alternative to normal dye.
